name: Gess the pic
description:
Yeah, yeah, its absolutely brand new quiz game about the names of animals. What are you waiting for? You have several reasons to check this game out:

● Hundreds of interesting questions
● Regular updates!
● Intuitive interface

If that’s not enough..

● Earn coins and spend them on hints!
● Play and level up your knowledge!
● Complete achievements to grab some extra points!

If you reading this - hurry up to try!
